content: Nel 1997, in una seconda partita (la prima si era verificata l'anno prima), il supercomputer IBM Deep Blue sconfisse il Gran Maestro Garry Kasparov di 3,5 X 2,5.
translations: eng:In 1997, in a second match (the first one had occurred the year before), IBM supercomputer Deep Blue defeated Grand Mast
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
